#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int z[5000000+10],n;
void z_function(string s) {
     n = (int) s.length();
   // vector z(n);
    for (int i = 1, l = 0, r = 0; i < n; ++i) {
        if (i <= r)
            z[i] = min (r - i + 1, z[i - l]);
        while (i + z[i] < n && s[z[i]] == s[i + z[i]])
            ++z[i];
        if (i + z[i] - 1 > r)
            l = i, r = i + z[i] - 1;
    }
   // return z;
}
int main()
{
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	int q,x;
	scanf("%d",&q);
	z_function(s);
	while(q--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&x);
		if(z[x]<=min(x,n-x))
			printf("%d \n",z[x]);
		else
			printf("%d\n",x);
	}
	
	return 0;
}
